column3: Who disturbs the gloom?\x02\x10\x01\x03Ahhh, mortals from the realm of light.\x02\x10\x01\x03You have not stumbled here without purpose...
I am the Cloud of Darkness.\x02\x10\x01\x03What I do not smother, I devour.\x02\x10\x01\x03What I cannot devour, I destroy.
The covenant is everlasting.\x02\x10\x01\x03All mortals before the flood of darkness\x02\x10\x01\x03will sink lifeless into the void!
